title: Provide Weekly Project Status Report
description: A project manager needs to send the weekly status report to an enterprise customer.

tasks.description: Gather updates on completed tasks, upcoming milestones, and any blockers from the project team.
tasks.expected_outcome: Project manager collects all necessary status updates.

tasks.description: Update the project's RAG status (Red, Amber, Green) and write a concise executive summary.
tasks.expected_outcome: Project manager accurately reflects the project's health.

tasks.description: Generate the status report from a template and email it to the customer stakeholders.
tasks.expected_outcome: Project manager sends a clear and professional status report.
